nodes.text: Aleena was one of the primary languages of Aleen, as it is spoken by the native Aleena species. The Aleena were also capable of speaking Galactic Basic Standard. C-3PO was known to have been able to speak Aleena, as he encountered it when the Galactic Republic traveled on a mercy mission to Aleen.
Aleena first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Mercy Mission", which first aired on October 7th, 2011.
